name: Crazy Fingers - Tests of Reaction
description:
Multiple countries TOP 10 game! Crazy Fingers is coming!

What’s your IQ? Smartest? Or stupidness.
You don’t want to miss the best reaction game ever! The Crazy Finger includes series of stimulating and exciting mini-games that measures your reaction.
Want to be challenged? Want to see how fast you can tap and how sharp is your reaction to cut the vegetable before your finger get hurt. Complete all levels, top the leaderboard and beat your friends! The crazy Finger promises to bring you the greatest fun time ever! Enjoy with your friends and families!

Highlights:
●Brand new levels & experience!
●Unbelievable easy to play!
●Funny contents and grahics!
●Two modes can be collected!
